description: Try our easy to follow Honey Oat Balls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bliss & protein ball,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Honey Oat Balls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2.5 cup Uncle Tobys Oats Traditional Porridge

recipeInstructions.text: Process 2 cups Uncle Tobys traditional oats, prunes, honey, cinnamon and butter in a food processor until well combined.
Place remaining Uncle Tobys traditional oats on a plate. Using 1 level tablespoon of prune mixture at a time, roll into a ball, and then roll in remaining oats to coat.
Place on a baking tray lined with baking paper. Refrigerate for 30 minutes or until firm. Store oat balls in an airtight container in the fridge.
